alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Alachua, southwestern Union and southern Columbia Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Providence, or 10 miles east of Ichetucknee Spring, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... High Springs, Worthington Springs, Upland Pines, Providence and La Crosse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alachua; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua
